attributes.action: mothers refusing the believe that hes is the father.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What we need, if a male believes he is the father of the child but the mother refuses to believe it, is a way to make the mother take a paternity test. There should be a law so that once the male is proven to be the dad, she cannot take money from the government.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
